meta.name: Create Document
meta.description: Creates or updates a document in a specified Firestore collection (with document reference field type support).

meta.name: Get User Data With Email
meta.description: Fetch user data from Firebase Auth based given their email

meta.name: Add Object to Firestore Array
meta.description: Adds an object to an existing array in a Firestore document

meta.name: Collection Query
meta.description: Get documents of a query in Firestore with multiple filters (with support for document reference).

meta.name: Firestore Query Count
meta.description: Get server count of a query in Firestore with multiple filters

meta.name: Delete Firestore Document
meta.description: Delete a document from a Firestore collection

meta.name: Firestore Document Count
meta.description: Get the count of documents in a collection for a given filter

meta.name: Firestore Field Average
meta.description: This is blank script node to help you get started. [Full Documentation](https://docs.buildship.com/core-nodes/script).

meta.name: Firestore Field Sum
meta.description: Sum of field in collection for given filter

meta.name: Get Firestore Document
meta.description: Fetch a document from Firestore by its collection name and ID

meta.name: Get Document Field Value
meta.description: Fetches a specific field value from a document in a Firestore collection

meta.name: Update Document
meta.description: Updates an entire Firestore document with a given object

meta.name: Update Field Value
meta.description: Updates a field value in a Firestore document with a given object
